actionTemplate.title: Multi-tone concealer mixing map
steps: Mix a spot-concealing tone with skin-tone concealer to cover acne marks.
Mix a brightening tone with concealer for tear trough and nasolabial shadows.
Use a deeper tone to lift mouth corners; use peach mix for mild under-eye darkness.
Use a deeper neutral tone to softly contour the nose bridge (very little).
Tap to blend; keep layers thin and set only crease-prone zones.

rationaleTemplate: Mixing tones targets each concern with less product.
Thin layers keep concealer from looking dry or heavy.
